title: Designing a Cultural, Leisure, and Educational Activity System to Leverage the Educational Potential of Traditional Folk Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practice-focused course analyzing educational applications of traditional Japanese folk culture in limited smartphone-based technical environments and designing culture-leisure-education systems tailored to Russian educational contexts.

learning_goals: By analyzing educational applications of Japanese traditional folk culture, learners can explain how to integrate cultural elements into instructional design.
VR/simulation tools can be utilized to design educational activity scenarios based on traditional folk culture
Learners can develop and evaluate implementation plans for integrated cultural, leisure, and educational activities targeting small learner groups

resources: Digital Content Related to Traditional Folk Culture
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
